org.drip.product.params

Class EmbeddedOptionSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.params.EmbeddedOptionSchedule

  • public class EmbeddedOptionSchedule
extends Serializer
    This class is a place holder for the embedded option schedule for the component. Contains the schedule of exercise dates and factors, the exercise notice period, and the option is to call or put. Further, if the option is of the type fix-to-float on exercise, contains the post-exercise floater index and floating spread. If the exercise is not discrete (American option), the exercise dates/factors are discretized according to a pre-specified discretization grid.

                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs the EOS from the array of dates and factors
        Parameters:
        adblDate - Array of dates
        adblFactor - Matched Array of Factors
        bIsPut - True (Put), False (Call)
        iNoticePeriod - Exercise Notice Period
        bFixToFloatOnExercise - True => component becomes a floater on call
        dblFixToFloatExerciseDate - Date at which the fix to float conversion happens
        strFloatIndex - Floater Rate Index
        dblFixToFloatSpread - Floater Spread
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if inputs are invalid

        Creates the discretized American EOS schedule from the array of dates and factors
